short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Business-class Texting Software - Start texting directly from your CRM, ATS or any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Business text messaging software that increases engagement and improves communication with customers, candidates, and employees. 

The all-new TextUs Chrome extension is now available! This new Chrome extension brings improved ease of use, better performance, and an updated look and feel. The TextUs Chrome extension brings our text messaging functionality directly to your Chrome browser. 

Whatâ€™s included in the new TextUs Chrome extension: 
- Two-way text messaging within your browser  
- Send text campaigns directly from your CRM, ATS, or other supported system 
- Personalize messages with emojis, images, short links, and more 
- Easily manage your inbox and conversations 
- Quickly import and manage contacts and groups
